mapper.select: select emp_id, emp_nm from emp where wstate_cd <> '1' and expire_dt is null
select e.emp_id, e.emp_nm, a.att_dt, a.att_time from attendance a, emp e where a.emp_id = e.emp_id and a.att_time IS NOT NULL and a.att_dt = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')
select a.app_id, e.emp_nm, a.input_sysdt, a.app_title from emp e, approval a where e.emp_id = a.app_emp_id and a.app_pro_cd = 0

select e.emp_id as emp_id, e.emp_nm as emp_nm, e.pos_id as pos_id, p.pos_nm as pos_nm, d.dept_id as dept_id, d.dept_nm as dept_nm, a.att_time as att_time, a.lea_time as lea_time from emp e, dept d, pos p, attendance a where e.dept_id = d.dept_id and e.pos_id = p.pos_id and e.emp_id = a.emp_id and a.att_dt = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd')
